markdown.markdown: I am currently a Ph.D. candidate in Geophysics at the University of Alberta (UofA). I conduct research under the guidance of Prof. Mauricio Sacchi that focuses on developing deep-learning tools for solving inverse problems in seismic imaging and signal processing. Before coming to the UofA :canada: , I received a B.S. (2015) in geophysical engineering from Simon Bolivar University :venezuela: and an M.S. (2019) in computational geophysics from the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro :brazil:. My current research topics include: * Inverse problems * Deep learning and scientific machine learning * Seismic imaging and full-waveform inversion * Signal processing * HPC * Apr, 2023: Our paper on nullspace networks for reflectivity inversion was accepted for publication on Geophysical Prospecting. :fire: * Mar, 2023: I accepted an internship offer from Halliburton Landmark. I will be workig as a Geophysics intern in spring/summer 2023. :office: * Feb, 2023: I have been awarded the Alberta Innovates Scholarship. :muscle: * Feb, 2023: I gave a talk at TGS on "Deep learning applications for seismic imaging". * Jan, 2023: I gave several presentations at [SAIG sponsors meeting](https://saig.physics.ualberta.ca/doku.php?id=publications:annualreports:saig_23p){target="_blank"}. * Oct, 2022: I passed my PhD candicay exam! :beers:

I conduct research under the guidance of Prof. Mauricio Sacchi that focuses on developing deep-learning tools for solving inverse problems in seismic imaging and signal processing. Before coming to the UofA :canada: , I received a B.S. (2015) in geophysical engineering from Simon Bolivar University :venezuela: and an M.S. (2019) in computational geophysics from the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro :brazil:. My current research topics include: * Inverse problems * Deep learning and scientific machine learning * Seismic imaging and full-waveform inversion * Signal processing * HPC ## Updates * Apr, 2023: Our paper on nullspace networks for reflectivity inversion was accepted for publication on Geophysical Prospecting. :fire: * Mar, 2023: I accepted an internship offer from Halliburton Landmark. I will be workig as a Geophysics intern in spring/summer 2023. :office: * Feb, 2023: I have been awarded the Alberta Innovates Scholarship. :muscle: * Feb, 2023: I gave a talk at TGS on "Deep learning applications for seismic imaging". * Jan, 2023: I gave several presentations at [SAIG sponsors meeting](https://saig.physics.ualberta.ca/doku.php?id=publications:annualreports:saig_23p){target="_blank"}. * Oct, 2022: I passed my PhD candicay exam! :beers:
